website_summaries.verdict: The Summer Infant Monitor is a solid product if you're on a tighter budget, but some missing features mean it won't work in every situation.
pros: The Summer Infant Video Baby Monitor is affordable, and the basics work well for the most part
You can have it up and running in under a minute
cons: Reliable night vision is notably absent from the features, the resolution is low and there are some minor connection problems

customer_reviews.title: It shouldn't even be called Night Vision...more like Foggy Vision
customer_reviews.text: During the day the video quality is decent and the sound is also good. I didn't notice too much white noise. The wide angle is great too and captures the whole room. The night vision however...is horrible! I've attached a photo of what it looks like. You can't see anything!
customer_reviews.author: aghstisbrn

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 6 months, no return policy
customer_reviews.text: This monitor broke after 6 months. It stopped connecting with the base station. I also wasn’t thrilled that the turn on button was the same button that put the light on for the base station which woke up my baby multiple times. No thermostat and the camera doesn’t move so it’s not a good value for the price. Extremely disappointed since there is no return policy even though it broke 6 months from my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed at the battery and night virw
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product, I really do. The first month after I purchased the monitor I was really happy with it, becasue it does everything it supposes to do. But then I found out I couldn’t charge the battery for the monitor, like if I unplug it it will shut off. But besides that everything was fine so I sent it back for an exchange. After I received the exchange product, I found out that the new monitor wouldn’t charge, AND it wouldn’t do night view! The picture is what I see when I use it at night. Just black indifferentiable shadows. I am really disappointed now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonn

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Only negative is needing to keep the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Only negative is needing to keep the receiver plugged in for the video to not time out. I realize it's a battery saving feature but when you are laying on the bed with the receiver far away having to get up and turn it on when you hear a noise is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joel&Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comes with several severe issues right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I like the form factor of this monitor and camera. Screen is pretty huge comparing to other brands monitors and provides good picture quality. Super easy to use. BUT! My particular order is not working well. Here are the issues: - Battery does not hold charge for more then 10 minutes (even after charging it overnight). - Charging connector loosened, so monitor does not take charge until you HOLD the wire in very specific way. Assume those issues affected my device only. Will return it, and probably order new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect View
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby monitor. It gives us a clear image and we can hear our baby when he wakes up or watch him while he plays or sleeps. Easy to set up, easy to add monitors. Still wish the battery life was longer, but if connected to the charger, you can keep the screen on the entire time. If its not plugged in, it'll keep for a couple of hours if you're just checking the monitor image a few times per hour.
customer_reviews.author: The Cheeky Tart

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can setup more than one camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall this monitor is everything I needed. I love that you can setup more than one camera. I also love the nightlight settings and how it can be changed from the parent unit. The ability to talk through the camera is also a great feature. Only issue I’ve found is sometimes the camera does seem very fuzzy but it doesn’t happen often enough for me to say I wouldn’t purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We thought we’d give this monitor a try after using a Motorola with our first child. Compared to the Motorola we do not care for this monitor/camera. The biggest issue is that we cannot have any other electrical components next to the monitor or it cuts in and out. This means it can’t charge next to a cell phone, other baby monitor, or even next to a lamp on our bedside table. Additionally, the picture quality is not as clear as the Motorola we have. Very disappointed in this product. I just purchased another Motorola.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible NV Mode
customer_reviews.text: Night vision resolution is terrible. Very disappointed to pay that much and have a terrible night vision picture. Unable to make out any quality details. Return process was made extremely easy by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Simple Monitor System but Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: Summer Infant's website has FAQs which address most of the complaints I'm seeing for the poor reviews. I have had my monitor for 3 years and it works well. I added a second camera with my second child. Battery is not fantastic, but works for several hours while i have a babysitter, etc. I recently had the monitor unlink from the cameras and was afraid that I would have to buy a new one - but after a call with their 1-800 customer service, I was able to re-link the cameras and everything is working well again. I'm very happy with this simple monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Daniel Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Works great if plugged in
customer_reviews.text: for a video monitor it works fine but the battery life is terrible. You get maybe an hour. Maybe? That’s after it’s been plugged in all night. If it’s plugged in, it works perfectly but it’s a little disappointing I can’t take it with me throughout the house without the plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Very Poor night vision and the battery dies within 2 hours! It does not have the pan around the room option nor a temperature gauge, which I appreciated on my past purchase from summers infant. Disappointed I can't find that same camera, this one is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product. Poor video quality, the microphone function makes me sound like a demonic robot and terrifies all children within earshot. Wish I went with a security camera or something that connects to a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Okie90

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first six months but then things started getting bad. Connectivity issues. Battery drain issues etc until in about 9 months total it quit working altogether.
customer_reviews.author: amazonminds

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this monitor for even 2 months and already having problems. The place where the charger plugs into on the screen is a little black piece, whenever I take the charger out the black piece comes out with it. The monitor has not been dropped. When I plug the charger back in I have to make sure the black piece is placed back inside and I have to wiggle the charger wire for it to even start charging. I've loved our other Summer monitor we got over 3 years ago but I'm very disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: For as expensive as this is I was expecting it to be a lot better. We have had it over a year and it now won’t stay on unless it’s plugged in which is really frustrating. The video quality is the same as a cheap $50 monitor I had, the only difference is the screen size. Would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: I really loved everything about this product especially the affordable price but unfortunately I had to return it because the battery was only lasting about an hour and I needed it to last much longer then that.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal and Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Poor night vision.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera in light. Terrible night vision. Tried adjusting the settings and can’t even see images at night. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bonelli

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: This monitor will not work at all once it’s unplugged from the charger. It can charge for days but as soon as you take it off the charger, the sound goes out. The picture is still there but no sound! I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J

customer_reviews.title: Works for about 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Works great for like 5 months. Then where it had connected and had signal for 5 months, no longer has signal. I would have liked a monitor that would have lasted. Im literally 10 feet tops and the receiver keeps losing signal. Very annoying when you're trying to sleep and the noise keeps cutting out. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality sucks, the battery sucks (most monitors do though), and the worst issue is that the charger breaks VERY easily. We have went through 2 of these monitors in 2 years. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: They don't have a lot of fancy features like the one we use everyday at home
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for a crazy low price for use at grandparents' houses. They don't have a lot of fancy features like the one we use everyday at home, but definitely get the job done and have bene reliable. For under $50 I'd recommend them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: LRRNYC

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is a good size and the picture quality is pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is a good size and the picture quality is pretty decent. It comes with gear to mount it to the wall. We wanted to have this sitting on a floating wall shelf we have near the baby's crib, however when you point the camera down you can no longer get a picture using the night vision. That was really disappointing because we were forced to mount it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Pergande

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture
customer_reviews.text: Image quality at night is terrible. I can make out a blob that is my baby in her crib but no details at all. I only know where her head is because of where I laid her down. Also it cuts out and stalls often.
customer_reviews.author: bap

customer_reviews.title: Not the Wide View 2.0. this is a new version called In
customer_reviews.text: I was actually sent the IN VIEW 2.0. Not the WIDE VIEW 2.0. I’ve called summer and they told me that they are not compatible. So if you are looking to replace or add into your wide view existing cameras- this will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for night
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting day only, great product. This night vision sucks 100%. I played with it for 3 nights, different locations different light or darker options. It just sucks. Do not buy for night time use!!!
customer_reviews.author: TRUDY

customer_reviews.title: Talk to your kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to link with one I already had. It is so nice to talk through I tell my kid to get into bed. I love that if you link multiple cameras you can choose what camera or scan between the cameras
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The wide screen is nice and the camera shows a good picture even when dark! I like the built in light and the two way speaker. The minister sometimes loses signal when I have my phone close to it, but overall an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is actually better than I expected! And I can talk to my baby as well. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton N

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor bad battery
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd summer infant monitor. I continue to buy this brand because I know how they work, simple and reliable except the charge is worthless otherwise it does exactly what you need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would not purchase this monitor again. I bought this video monitor less than a year ago. The battery only works for a couple of hours unplugged. Within the last couple of weeks, the picture and sound goes in and out. In certain areas of my house, it doesn’t get signal at all (these areas had no problem in the past).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ptotects my wife
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my wife who has Alzheimer's disease and needs monitoring at night to keep her from getti8ng up and falling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Video ia wonderful but the battery has no life
customer_reviews.text: Video ia wonderful but the battery has no life. Have to keep plugged in or it dies. Also love that I can speak to my baby grandchild to soothe.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality, impossible to use at night
customer_reviews.text: I returned this the very next day. Although it has a nice big screen and is easy to setup. The picture quality is extremely poor. And it got even worse at night. I returned this because it was impossible to see my baby at night time and this time is the most important to us. Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: We love this monitor. So nice to be able to see what our child is doing throughout their whole room. I recommend this to all of our friends.
customer_reviews.author: Prodigity

customer_reviews.title: ... you can still see overall well enough to be comfortable checking on your little one from the screen
customer_reviews.text: Imagine is quite grainy so you can't see detail but you can still see overall well enough to be comfortable checking on your little one from the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good. I’d recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer baby monitor I had my first for 2.5 years then I dropped the monitor in water! And it worked for a little while after then stopped. But I loved it so I got another one and now I have two cameras so that’s cool. The picture isn’t the best but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this monitor. The night vision picture is terrible. It looks like there is a film over the camera or something, there isn’t I checked. My baby is actually in the crib in this pic but I can’t see him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mowery

customer_reviews.title: It's great normal except if you keep the screen view on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great normal except if you keep the screen view on the monitor, the battery only lasts one hour
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Why the hell is the light on the same button as the “on” button?!
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all, but why in the world would someone design a monitor with the “on” switch and the “light” switch on the same button?! This was not designed for parents who enjoy their child staying asleep...
customer_reviews.author: J a.

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly! Good image, good sound. There’s only one bad thing: it should come with more cameras .
customer_reviews.author: Tricia R.

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this system
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this system! I was expecting the same image quality as shown on Amazon, however when the room is dark the image is HAZY! I couldn’t even see my baby on the screen and the camera was resting on the top of the crib.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is grainy, washed out and jerky. ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is grainy, washed out and jerky. We have a much older Summer monitor that worked well and still works. The picture quality of this new monitor is much poorer than on the old Summer monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing baby monitor (and we've kissed some frogs)
customer_reviews.text: Really great baby monitor. Way easy to aim and adjust. Great battery life (our last one died so we could only use it when plugged in).
customer_reviews.author: Jared K.

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first monitor and it was already opened and missing the charger for the monitor. I was sent a new one. This one was in a sealed box BUT after charging the monitor for over 24hrs the handheld will not turn on! Never had such problems with a product! I would try a 3rd time but don’t think it’s worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Approximately 3 months after I purchased the monitor, it stopped working. Of course, this happened to be 2 weeks after the return window. Considering the price of this monitor, this is completely unacceptable. I'm also upset that I purchased it through Amazon; if it had been Target, I would be able to return it right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the view it provides. We can see exactly what my daughter is doing in her crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts in and out for sound/distance
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t reach the distance it is supposed to and even when you’re only two room away it cuts in and out. It’s the worst camera I’ve had and they will not do anything to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We liked it but it for some reason stopped working We ...
customer_reviews.text: We liked it but it for some reason stopped working We never dropped it nothing Just stopped Idk if somehow we can get a refund then we’d be happy if not idk
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna Terekhov

customer_reviews.title: Love that able to see my little guy
customer_reviews.text: Love that able to see my little guy. Wish the camera would move a bit easier, can’t always sees clearly what little one is doing however love that could talk to three the screen . But an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I can see and hear my baby and talk to him!
customer_reviews.text: Great product absolutely love it but dont drop it! It will break the screen on the tablet portion! Thats why i bought a second one on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is awful do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Do not buy. The picture is so fuzzy and blurry I can only see the outline of my baby. They even sent me a replacement and the new one has the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Van Fossen

customer_reviews.title: Fussy
customer_reviews.text: It's not clear at all. Very fussy. I had a Angel Care monitor before this and it was so much clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Besides the fact that the battery dies quickly, it works just perfect. Since I use it at home, it does not bother me. Screen is big, images are great, specially in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to use with her baby boy. She is still using it as he is transitioning into his toddler bed. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good baby monitor. Large screen and decent image. I like how you can talk back to your baby and the nightlight is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WIDE VIEW IS GREAT FOR EYE SPYING THIS LITTLE ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: ... have the clearest picture but it picks up sound good.
customer_reviews.text: The camera does not have the clearest picture but it picks up sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Never had a video monitor before and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McClish

customer_reviews.title: but the screen is easily broken when dropped from a table top
customer_reviews.text: The system works as advertised, but the screen is easily broken when dropped from a table top. Would gave preferred an LCD, instead of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible resolution
customer_reviews.text: Horrible resolution. Pics on the packaging make it look like it is HD, but it is hard to see in light and impossible in dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. We used it while we watched our almost 2 year old granddaughter for 11 days.
customer_reviews.author: keith marcum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very clear video and sound quality. Works well even when the room is dark. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Stopped working in 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this camera, it stopped working in 4 months. Such a waste of money! Ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Clarke

customer_reviews.title: The night vision is cool!
customer_reviews.text: This infant audio/visual monitor has been so handy with a newborn. We are able to keep our eyes on her at all times. We can hear her cough on the lowest volume setting. It picks up wonderfully. It was easy to install (mounted on the wall above her crib) and the range for the wireless monitor picks up well throughout our house and even all the way to our mailbox (which is 30+ yards from our house). The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the picture is kinda grainy, however, you can see your baby well enough to know where and how he/she is laying at all times.
customer_reviews.author: TNJ2007

customer_reviews.title: I've always been skeptical to get one because I always thought these were a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOOOVE this baby monitor!! I've always been skeptical to get one because I always thought these were a waste of money. I finally decided to bite the bullet and get one, and man.. I'm really glad I did. The screen quality is nice, and it has a night mode. I love that it has a large screen and a long battery life. The signal strength is great, I'm able to go to the kitchen and not worry about losing connection.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the widescreen feature, however, the night vision is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: I got this thinking that it's a good price, I've had a Summer Infant monitor before
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of having a baby monitor is to see your baby. The picture on the screen is so embarrassingly grainy. I got this thinking that it's a good price, I've had a Summer Infant monitor before, this should be fine. It wasn't fine. I returned it within a week.
customer_reviews.author: gkj121

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple video monitors and was was having some issues like the restriction of view, really bad blurry view, would loose signal allot and The sound was mainly static etc. This monitor has amazing wide view that gives me more assurance of everything around him and the sound it crystal clear. And the mountable option made life so much easier and the battery lasts much longer than any previous monitor I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Norallia

customer_reviews.title: Will return ASAP, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible video quality. Range is supposed to be 800 ft but I can't seem to get signal from my bedroom to the nursery (less than 300 ft.) Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: E. Braham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, only lasted 3 months before the video went out.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this at least 4 stars (maybe 5) as I had been pretty happy with it. The picture quality wasn't great, but this was cheaper than many other brands too. All of a sudden today the video doesn't work. Luckily it was literally 5 days before it wasn't eligible for return. Reordered the same one as I was happy with it. Hopefully the next one last more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing just stopped working the second time I even used it. It went black and said there was no signal when clearly everything was hooked up correctly and nothing worked to fix it. It just did that out of nowhere! Complete waste of money! What is wrong with all of these baby monitor being a piece of crap and breaking!
customer_reviews.author: kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not see how this was any better than the older model I had. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible picture quality, very grainy and blurry. We got vision is poor as well. Would not recommend. We sent ours back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: ... a few baby monitors and this one is the best.. signal stays good no matter where you ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few baby monitors and this one is the best .. signal stays good no matter where you go in house ...
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: I really like the wide view lens and the easy set up ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wide view lens and the easy set up and use. I had trouble with the cord. It wasn't charging the monitor well or at all. I had to call the Summer Company and work with them and they sent me another cord free of charge. It was difficult getting a brand new monitor and it not work properly. I also wish that the monitor moved by remote. It does not and it would be great if it did. It also doesn't connect with your phone, so if you're wanting to be able to do that, get a different version.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: After we set up our cameras, it has been pretty disappointing, especially for the price we paid. The picture is extremely grainy during the day and night. It's misleading for the packaging and advertising images to show HD quality images, but the video quality is nothing like that. Very frustrated and we will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rham

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this is a joke. Can’t believe they charge this much for it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. As described. The size is just perfect . Very useful and easy to use . 100% Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jose Verde

product_meta.title: Summer Wide View 2.0 Baby Video Monitor with 5-inch Screen and Wide View Camera
product_meta.description: Now you can have the peace of mind of hearing and seeing your baby with wide view technology, day or night. The Summer Infant Wide View 2.0 Video Baby Monitor with 5.0 Inch Color Screen is just what you need to keep a close eye on baby in the nursery. The parent-friendly zoom is perfect for getting a closer look at your little one as they sleep & dream. Once they get older, the wide angle lens allows you to see 4X more of the room – which means you can see your toddler as they scoot from side to side. You can even soothe your baby back to sleep with the convenient talk-back feature and the on/off remote control nightlight. You can also expand this system with up to 3 more additional cameras (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Wide angle lens video camera with digital zoom
5.0" high resolution color LCD video display, with black and white automatic night vision; 800-ft. range
100% digital technology for privacy and security
Expandable system – add cameras to monitor multiple children or rooms with video and audio scan between rooms, up to 4 total (extra cameras sold separately)
Up to 800 ft range with low battery and out of range indicators

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars192 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
